content: Remember that foods like Jell-O, ice cream, gravy, and soup count towards your daily fluid restriction. Prepare all foods to the appropriate internal cooking temperature to prevent foodborne illness. Add apple cider or cranberry spritzers instead of hot chocolate, eggnog, and alcoholic beverages. Attend and complete all your dialysis treatments. title: Avoiding Holiday Eating Pitfalls for Dialysis Patients
